mainInformation.title: Retrospective
mainInformation.description: Nicely played. You have now reached the retrospective. This means you get to invest some story points. Choose what you think will benefit you, the process and the company the most. It's okay not to choose any option.

level1.strategy: Have a coffee to increase the productivity of your colleagues

consequences.consequence: Oh no, you spilled the coffee all over the table. Three computers were destroyed!
The coffee was very much appreciated by your colleagues. You are working really well now!
Typically, the coffee was way too old. Productivity is declining due to stomach ailments.
The coffee was a success. It was a long time since you worked so well. The atmosphere is great.
Typically, the weather is too bad to play. Disappointment lowers colleagues' productivity.
What a great idea! The tennis tournament was a hit! The atmosphere is really good at work.
You got to know each other better through the activity. The collaboration has never been better!
Too bad, the tennis tournament did not seem to be a hit. Maybe you should try another activity next time.
Really good idea! You found out a lot of things you did not know before. Now you can develop a better product!
What a great idea! The relationship between you and the customer feels better than ever.
You have created a really good relationship with the customer. The customer would like to hire you for more assignments.
Good try! However, the customer does not have time to talk more than you already do.

level1.strategy: Try to convince the boss that you should abandon the agile working method

consequences.consequence: The boss was not so fond of your idea. Better luck next time!
The boss agreed to test your proposal. However, the outcome was not so positive as you found it difficult to handle additional requirements.
Unfortunately, that was not a good idea. Better luck next time!
No good idea! Luckily the boss was busy with something else!
